name: djt-devious-jezebel-trickery-asset-pack
description: GDevelop 5 Asset Pack for DJT: Devious Jezebel Trickery - Modern Mega Man-inspired platformer mechanics
author: DJT Team
description_long: Complete asset pack for building Modern Mega Man-inspired platformers. Includes player movement (wall-sliding, dashing, double-jump), weapon switching system, enemy AI behaviors, boss battle mechanics, HUD system, and progression system. Designed for the DJT: Devious Jezebel Trickery game but fully reusable for any platformer project.
